Description: Angular squat wheelmade cup in a typical Meroitic style with flat base, low angular shoulder and straight walls with direct slightly everted rim with two grooves below rim. Base damaged and partially missing. Covered in pale red slip exterior and decorated with frieze demarcated by two painted black lines above and below. Frieze filled with alternating geometric lotus flowers in black paint with red buds, and geomentric triangle shape, separated by painted lines. Re-assembled from fragments; base lost.
